ctx: intros a b x y H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b : Z, Z.gcd a b = 1%Z <-> Znumtheory.rel_prime a b" on hypothesis of type "gcdZ a b = 1%Z".

ctx: intros a b x y H.
exceptions.tactic: apply verify_BezoutZ_rec with (v := Bezout_i a b 0 0 (eq_refl (0%Z))).
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, x, y : Z H : gcdZ a b = 1%Z Hrel : Znumtheory.rel_prime a b The term "eq_refl" has type "0%Z = 0%Z" while it is expected to have type "(a * 0 + b * 0)%Z = gcdZ a b".

ctx: intros a b x y H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros a b x y H. apply Znumtheory.Zgcd_1_rel_prime in H. destruct (Znumtheory.rel_prime_dec a b) as [Hrel|Hnrel]. - apply verify_BezoutZ_rec with (v := Bezout_i a b 0 0 (eq_refl (0%Z))). intros u v Hgcd. exists (x * u + y * v)%Z. split. + unfold congruentZ. exists (-v)%Z. ring. + unfold congruentZ. exists u. ring. - exfalso. apply Hnrel. auto.
